trans-unit.source: Provides information about the status and data resulting from a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send*> or <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre o status e os dados resultantes de um <> </> *> ou <> </> *> operação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class attempts to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request to a remote computer and receive information back from the computer via an ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>classe tenta enviar uma solicitação de eco ICMP Internet Control Message Protocol () para um computador remoto e receber informações do computador por meio de uma mensagem de resposta de eco ICMP.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class uses instances of the PingReply class to return information about the operation, such as its status and the time taken to send the request and receive the reply.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>classe usa instâncias da classe PingReply para retornar informações sobre a operação, como o status e o tempo necessário para enviar a solicitação e receber a resposta.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> methods return instances of the PingReply class directly.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>métodos retornam instâncias da classe PingReply diretamente.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods return a PingReply in the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> method's <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>métodos retornam um PingReply no <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>do método <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs>parâmetro.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The PingReply is accessed through the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O PingReply é acessada por meio de <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, you should not use the values returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> or <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>não é <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, você não deve usar os valores retornados pelo <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>ou <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> property will return zero, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> property will return an empty array, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>propriedade retornará zero, o <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>propriedade retornará uma matriz vazia e o <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>propriedade retornará `null`.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the address of the host that sends the Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo reply.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o endereço do host que envia a resposta de eco ICMP Internet Control Message Protocol ().

trans-unit.source: The Address returned by any of the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> overloads can originate from a malicious remote computer.
trans-unit.target: O endereço retornado por qualquer uma da <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>sobrecargas podem se originar de um computador remoto mal-intencionado.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not connect to the remote computer using this address.
trans-unit.target: Não se conecte ao computador remoto usando esse endereço.

trans-unit.source: Use DNS to determine the IP address of the machine to which you want to connect.
trans-unit.target: Use o DNS para determinar o endereço IP do computador ao qual você deseja se conectar.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> containing the destination for the ICMP echo message.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>que contém o destino da mensagem de eco ICMP.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: Gets the buffer of data received in an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o buffer de dados recebidos em uma mensagem de resposta de eco ICMP Internet Control Message Protocol ().

trans-unit.source: The data buffer sent with the ICMP echo request is returned to the sender in the echo reply so the roundtrip travel time for a packet of a known size can be computed.
trans-unit.target: O buffer de dados enviado com a solicitação de eco ICMP é retornado para o remetente da resposta de eco para que o tempo de viagem de ida e volta para um pacote de um tamanho conhecido pode ser calculado.

trans-unit.source: The data buffer, combined with the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> option, can be used to discover the maximum transmission unit for the network path between the source and destination computers.
trans-unit.target: O buffer de dados, combinados com o <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>opção, pode ser usado para descobrir a unidade de transmissão máxima para o caminho de rede entre os computadores de origem e destino.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see "Traceroute" in RFC 1574, Section 3.2, available at http://www.ietf.org.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte "Rastreamento de rotas" no RFC 1574, seção 3.2, disponível em http://www.ietf.org.

trans-unit.source: The default buffer used with <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> contains 32 bytes of data.
trans-unit.target: O buffer de padrão usado com <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>e <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>contém 32 bytes de dados.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array containing the data received in an ICMP echo reply message, or an empty array, if no reply was received.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Byte>matriz que contém os dados recebidos em uma mensagem de resposta de eco ICMP ou uma matriz vazia se nenhuma resposta foi recebida.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Gets the options used to transmit the reply to an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as opções usadas para transmitir a resposta a uma solicitação de eco ICMP Internet Control Message Protocol ().

trans-unit.source: The TTL defines the number of times nodes can forward a packet as it travels between its source and destination.
trans-unit.target: O TTL define o número de vezes que nós podem encaminhar um pacote enquanto trafegam entre sua origem e destino.

trans-unit.source: If the number of forwards, also known as hops, exceeds the value specified for the TTL, the packet is deemed undeliverable and is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se o número de encaminhamentos, também conhecido como saltos, excede o valor especificado para o TTL, o pacote é considerado não entregue e é descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> value specified in the ICMP echo request controls packet fragmentation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>valor especificado na fragmentação de pacotes ICMP echo solicitação controles.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> is `true` and the packet size exceeds the maximum transmission unit of the network path taken by the packet, the packet is discarded and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> error is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>é `true` e o tamanho do pacote excede a unidade de transmissão máxima do caminho de rede usada pelo pacote, o pacote será descartado e o <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>será retornado.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions"></xref> object that contains the Time to Live (TTL) and the fragmentation directive used for transmitting the reply if <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status*> is <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions"> </xref> objeto que contém o tempo de vida (TTL) e a diretiva de fragmentação usado para transmitir a resposta se <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status*>é <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of milliseconds taken to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request and receive the corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de milissegundos que levou para enviar uma solicitação de eco ICMP Internet Control Message Protocol () e receber a mensagem de resposta de eco ICMP correspondente.

trans-unit.source: If the Echo request fails, the RoundtripTime time is reported as 0, which is also a valid value when the request succeeds.
trans-unit.target: Se a solicitação de eco falhar, o tempo de RoundtripTime será relatado como 0, que também é um valor válido quando a solicitação for bem-sucedida.

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> to determine whether the value returned by this property should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Você deve verificar o <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>para determinar se o valor retornado por essa propriedade deve ser ignorado.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> that specifies the round trip time, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int64>que especifica o tempo de viagem de ida e, em milissegundos.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the status of an attempt to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request and receive the corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o status de uma tentativa de enviar uma solicitação de eco ICMP Internet Control Message Protocol () e receber a mensagem de resposta de eco ICMP correspondente.

trans-unit.source: If the value of Status is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, you should not use the values returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> or <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de Status não for <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, você não deve usar os valores retornados pelo <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>ou <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties will return zero, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>e <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Propriedades retornará zero e o <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>propriedade retornará `null`.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus"></xref> value indicating the result of the request.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus"> </xref> valor que indica o resultado da solicitação.
